name: Postal
author: MVG
description:
Ported to the Switch by MVG. Original game by Running with Scissors in 1997

Original Source Release - https://bitbucket.org/gopostal/postal-1-open-source
Running with Scissors Website - http://runningwithscissors.com/

Wide Screen and Twin Stick optimized for the Nintendo Switch :)
Runs on 5.x firmware.

Place Postal Data files in 'res' folder. You can get Postal Redux for 1.99 on GoG.com or via other means.
